channel.title: Client Wont connect to source?
channel.description: Okay, I have been messing with the source and such for awhile now. Today i did some portfowarding crap and now my client says "error connecting to server" Dafuq? Someone help me please! ANd im EXTREMELY noob to servers.

item.title: Client Wont connect to source?
item.dc:creator: @Deus1993 Deus1993
item.description:
@Deus1993 wrote:

Search your files for “43594”

Or even possibly part of the base’s name (that might be part of their IP)

Read full topic

item.title: Client Wont connect to source?
item.dc:creator: @duhstract duhstract
item.description:
@duhstract wrote:

[quote=“Crown2, post:11, topic:437664”][quote author=duhstract link=topic=540368.msg3957283#msg3957283 date=1332886411]
Okay, I have been messing with the source and such for awhile now.
Today i did some portfowarding crap and now my client says “error connecting to server”
Dafuq?
Someone help me please!
ANd im EXTREMELY noob to servers.
[/quote]

make sure you did not change your ip the client your running needs to be 127.0.0.1 and the other players (assuming not on your network) should be on no-ip also make sure your ports are the same in server and client :)[/quote]

I can’t find where i change my server ip.

oh wow you said port -.-

I need someone to walk me thru it on skype…

Read full topic

item.title: Client Wont connect to source?
item.dc:creator: @Crown2 Crown2
item.description:
@Crown2 wrote:

[quote=“duhstract, post:1, topic:437664”]Okay, I have been messing with the source and such for awhile now.
Today i did some portfowarding crap and now my client says “error connecting to server”
Dafuq?
Someone help me please!
ANd im EXTREMELY noob to servers.[/quote]

make sure you did not change your ip the client your running needs to be 127.0.0.1 and the other players (assuming not on your network) should be on no-ip also make sure your ports are the same in server and client

Read full topic

item.title: Client Wont connect to source?
item.dc:creator: @xneonx xneonx
item.description:
@xneonx wrote:

[quote=“duhstract, post:9, topic:437664”]I went to The no-ip website and got me a host, is that what it is?
I know im asking dumb questions. just seem to get it to work. sorry.[/quote]
Now that you have the no-ip address, just follow what axecutor9090 said. Or just go here.

Read full topic

item.title: Client Wont connect to source?
item.dc:creator: @duhstract duhstract
item.description:
@duhstract wrote:

[quote=“axecutor9090, post:6, topic:437664”]Go to your client folder, Open client.java, Find “Server =”
It Should say something like "Server = “Something Here”
Replace The “Something Here” With Your No-Ip Address.
Save Compile And run/Jar[/quote]

As I said, noob to server coding. I need someone to help me on skype or something. I’m like, server retarded.

Read full topic

item.title: Client Wont connect to source?
item.dc:creator: @axecutor9090 axecutor9090
item.description:
@axecutor9090 wrote:

Go to your client folder, Open client.java, Find “Server =”
It Should say something like "Server = “Something Here”
Replace The “Something Here” With Your No-Ip Address.
Save Compile And run/Jar

Read full topic

item.title: Client Wont connect to source?
item.dc:creator: @duhstract duhstract
item.description:
@duhstract wrote:

I want it so freinds can join.
can Anyone help?

Read full topic

item.title: Client Wont connect to source?
item.dc:creator: @xneonx xneonx
item.description:
@xneonx wrote:

ultimatepkvillage:

^^ false, correct answer is did you set it to 127.0.0.1?

Not really. If he was wanting it to be online for a friend or two to join then he would set it to his no-ip. He would set it to the localhost ip if he wanted to make it online for him and only him. So not really a false answer.

Read full topic
